name: Time City Ha Noi Apartment
address: Unit 18, Floor 02, Building P03, Time City Town, 458 Minh Khai Street, Hai Ba Trung District Hanoi, Hoang Mai District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set 2.3 km from Hanoi Creative City in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features a balcony. Time City Ha Noi Apartment boasts views of the garden and is 3.7 km from National Museum of Vietnamese History. Free WiFi is featured .

Towels and bed linen are offered in this apartment. Other facilities at Time City Ha Noi Apartment include a spa centre.

Hanoi Opera House is 3.8 km from Time City Ha Noi Apartment, while Ba Dinh Square is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 26 km from Time City Ha Noi Apartment.
